resources.string: It can take some time to load the Help file.
Unknown error occurred while loading the Help file from assets.\nPlease go back to main screen and try again.\nI apologize for the inconvenience.
Error occurred while accessing the help file.\n

Unable to display help content.
Please check if your SD card is properly mounted and available to the device.
If you are plugged into your computer or laptop via USB, unplug it.
When the condition is fixed, go back to main screen and retry.
Help file was damaged. Please go back to main screen and re-launch the HELP option.\nI apologize for the inconvenience.

Help file is damaged beyond repair. Please follow the steps below to fix it:
a. Plug in your device into a laptop or computer.
b. Mount it when prompted.
c. Navigate to root folder.
d. Delete file.
e. Unplug the device.
f. Relaunch the HELP option from main screen.
I apologize for the inconvenience.
Unable to find the Help content. Please try again.\nTry re-mounting your SD card and restarting your device.
Unsupported Operation
Free version only supports One Time Alerts.
Reminder was not created.\nYou have reached the limit on maximum number of Reminders you can create using the FREE version of this APP.
Reminder for the same location already exists. What would you like to do?
Please enter a valid Reminder Name.
Sorry, but no reminders were found.
Unable to create Reminder.
The reminder you are trying to access no longer exists.\nIt is possible that it was a one time reminder and was purged after notification.
Reminder was updated externally.
Multiple matching addresses found.
Address could not be located on Map. Please select another point of interest on the map or enter another address.
Turning ON this feature will try to keep your map centered based on your current location.\nNote that leaving this turned on will increase power consumption and hence not recommended.
Confirm Purchase
Would you like to purchase the Key to unlock the APP?\nIn case you have already purchased it, this operation will simply reinstall it.\nWould you like to proceed?
Provider is not currently available
Your Location providers are disabled, do you want to enable one or more Location providers?
Tap on the marker to create reminder for selected address.
You want to create an Reminder for address
Location Based Reminder
Location Based Reminder successfully initialized...
You are now using Full version of the Location Based Reminder APP.
Successfully deleted all user created reminders.
Reminder cannot be set for past.
The supplied Date-Times for the reminder window are out of sequence. Please try again.
No timing information provided.
Confirm Action
Would you like to proceed?
Sorry, unable to delete the reminder.
Tip: to View/Edit/Delete a reminder, select reminder and long press.
Tip: Enter address or click on Map.\nPress Menu for more options."
Please rate the application on the Android market. I look forward to hear from you. Please send your comments, feedback, suggestions to rohitspage@gmail.com
